member.name: T:nuke
member.summary: Contains the function holder to allow players to use M.O.A.B.s

member.name: F:nuke.NukeFuncs
member.summary:
Holds the functions to allow scripts to call the nuke functions.
NOTE: You must have the nuke.dll script loaded in the server to use this reference!!
member.remarks: You must have the nuke.dll script loaded to use this reference!!

member.name: M:nuke.giveNuke(InfinityScript.Entity,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gives a M.O.A.B. to the player as a killstreak.
member.param: The player to give the M.O.A.B. to
If true, the M.O.A.B. will stay in the player's killstreaks until they use it. If false, it will go away when the player dies.

member.name: M:nuke.tryUseNuke(InfinityScript.Entity,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Trys to use a M.O.A.B. with the given player as the user. This will count as using an actual M.O.A.B. to the player.
member.param: The player to be the M.O.A.B. user
Whether the M.O.A.B. can be cancelled when the player dies. scr_nukeCancelMode must be higher than 0!
member.returns: Returns true if the M.O.A.B. was successfully called in, false otherwise.

member.name: M:nuke.tryUseNukeImmediate(InfinityScript.Entity)
member.summary: Trys to use a M.O.A.B. immediately with the given player as the user. This will immediately detonate the M.O.A.B., skipping the timers. This will count as using an actual M.O.A.B. to the player.
member.param: The player to be the M.O.A.B. user
member.returns: Returns true if the M.O.A.B. was successfully Function.Called in, false otherwise.
